name: Romancing Kanon: Eien no Shoujo Densetsu
storyline: Black clouds gather around the Kanon city. 88 saint warriors have gathered there to defend honor and show their world class special moves. In the meantime there is one girl who does not have such skills, but who trains diligently to protect this city from the power of Abyss.
summary: RPG game released in 2002 in the Japanese comic market. The latest version is 1.5 A.
